channel.title: DrakeScape - 317 - DeltaScape Based
channel.description:
[center][b]Welcome to the official DrakeScape development thread.[/b][/center]
[b]Foreword;[/b] I do not own DrakeScape, I am just the dedicated coder it has, I have made the Website, Forum, Blog, and followed DeathChaos9's Tutorial for Highscores. I am in process of creating the server and i am posting it here to let everybody know how the development is going.
[hr]
[b]Base;[/b] DeltaScape [b]Completion;[/b] 6%
[hr] [center][b]F[/b]requently [b]A[/b]sked [b]Q[/b]uestions[/center]
[b]1, Can i join the development?[/b] No, Unfortunatly this is not a development team and is just a development.
[b]2, What makes this server different?[/b] This server isn't going to be a 10 second server. This server is going to take weeks possibly months to complete and i will not stop until it is perfect.
[b]3, So, What is there to do?[/b] Alot, I am going to make perfect skilling bases with an average experience rate, It will take over a week to get a skill 99, so it will be better than alot of servers. Bare in mind, If you like servers where everyone is combat 126 and pking each other this isnt for you.
[hr]
[b]Developers Blog; 28/03/2010[/b] Today i spent a few hours working on a Staffing system amongst other things, and this is what i came up with
Our staff will be split into 4 different groups (this is in order of importance, (1 being most important, 4 being least))
[ol][li]General Moderation[/li] [li]Player Support[/li] [li]Conflict Resolution[/li] [li]Staff Selection[/li][/ol]
[center][b][u]Explaining the roles[/u][/b]
[b]General Moderation[/b] Walk around server, Talking with players, Keeping a general eye out for trouble makers. (much like RuneScapes Player Moderators)
[b]Player Support[/b] All the of Abuse reports, and general queries will be handled by this team.
[b]Conflict Resolution[/b] This team will attend to any players that are having an arguemnt and try to help both players settle there differences.
[b]Staff Selection[/b] Will choose helpful community members to become server or Forum staff.[/center]
[hr]
[b]Changelog;[/b] Updated old models for new, new Monk Robes, Whip, added spirit shield.... Added Bounty Hunter, With targets, Points.. 100% My own code!
[hr]
[i]More to come soon[/i] [i]Many Thanks,[/i] [i]WowILikeToCode[/i] [i]Thomas[/i]

@_J_ava wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:10, topic:334487”][quote author=Koolvin link=topic=430887.msg3164632#msg3164632 date=1269903470]
I’ve got to say, those are the most half-ass forums I’ve ever seen, same with the site, I don’t see why you would try and show that off…
[/quote]

There isn’t any need for that

Anywho, good job. Hope this goes far.

Dude what are you on about, I’ve done more than you could ever do to a server so just stfu.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: DrakeScape - 317 - DeltaScape Based
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

[center]Welcome to the official DrakeScape development thread.[/center]

Foreword;
I do not own DrakeScape, I am just the dedicated coder it has, I have made the Website, Forum, Blog, and followed DeathChaos9’s Tutorial for Highscores. I am in process of creating the server and i am posting it here to let everybody know how the development is going.

[hr]

Base; DeltaScape
Completion; 6%

[hr]
[center]Frequently Asked Questions[/center]

1, Can i join the development?
No, Unfortunatly this is not a development team and is just a development.

2, What makes this server different?
This server isn’t going to be a 10 second server. This server is going to take weeks possibly months to complete and i will not stop until it is perfect.

3, So, What is there to do?
Alot, I am going to make perfect skilling bases with an average experience rate, It will take over a week to get a skill 99, so it will be better than alot of servers. Bare in mind, If you like servers where everyone is combat 126 and pking each other this isnt for you.

[hr]

Developers Blog; 28/03/2010
Today i spent a few hours working on a Staffing system amongst other things, and this is what i came up with

Our staff will be split into 4 different groups (this is in order of importance, (1 being most important, 4 being least))

[ol][li]General Moderation[/li]
[li]Player Support[/li]
[li]Conflict Resolution[/li]
[li]Staff Selection[/li][/ol]

[center]Explaining the roles

General Moderation
Walk around server, Talking with players, Keeping a general eye out for trouble makers. (much like RuneScapes Player Moderators)

Player Support
All the of Abuse reports, and general queries will be handled by this team.

Conflict Resolution
This team will attend to any players that are having an arguemnt and try to help both players settle there differences.

Staff Selection
Will choose helpful community members to become server or Forum staff.[/center]

[hr]

Changelog;
Updated old models for new, new Monk Robes, Whip, added spirit shield…
Added Bounty Hunter, With targets, Points… 100% My own code!

[hr]

More to come soon
Many Thanks,
WowILikeToCode
Thomas

Read full topic
